## Database creation

```{r}
con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "./contaminants-rlavoie-eccc.sqlite")
db_ddl_sql <- strsplit(paste(readLines("sql/db_create_ddl.sql"), collapse = "\n"), ";\n")[[1]]
purrr::walk(db_ddl_sql, \(x) DBI::dbExecute(con, x))
```
